title: The Indian Journal of Medical Research, July 1937. Vol. 25, issue 1 (1937)
subject: Science, Technology and Medicine
contents: Frontmatter / Colonel J. Taylor -- A Diet Survey Repeated at Another Season / W. R. Aykroyd and B. G. Krishnan -- Red-Palm Oil in the Treatment of Human Keratomalacia / W. R. Aykroyd and Lieut.-Colonel R. E. Wright -- The Possible Use of Red-Palm Oil in Supplementing the Vitamin-A Activity of Common Vegetable Oils / N. K. De -- The Adsorption of Vitamin A and Carotene and the Isolation of Vitamin A from Associated Pigments / N. K. De -- The Excretion of Vitamin C by Human Beings in South India / S. Ranganathan and G. Sankaran -- Studies on Vitamin-A Deficiency. Part II. Histopathology of the Skin in Human Keratomalacia / M. V. Radhakrishna Rao -- Survey of the Nutritive Value of Indian Foodstuffs. Part II. Changes in Chemical Composition Brought about by Cooking / S. Ranganathan, A. R. Sundararajan and M. Swaminathan -- The Relative Value of the Proteins of Certain Foodstuffs in Nutrition. Part II. The Comparative Biological Values of the Proteins of Certain Cereals, Pulses, and Skimmed Milk Powder, Measured by the Growth of Young Rats / M. Swaminathan -- Migration of Adrenaline in an Electrical Field / G. Sankaran and S. Ranganathan -- The Transformation of Carotene into Vitamin A in Liver Autolysates / H. Ellis C. Wilson and Bashir Ahmed -- Studies in Vitamin C. The Effect of Cooking and Storage on the Vitamin-C Contents of Foodstuffs / M. N. Rudra -- Influence of Histamine and Acetyl-Choline on Intestinal Movements / B. T. Krishnan -- A Preliminary Note on the Presence of a Histamine-Like Body in the Aqueous Humour in Glaucoma Associated with Epidemic Dropsy / Brevet-Colonel R. N. Chopra and N. N. De -- Observations on the Blood-Lipoid Changes in Opium Addicts / Brevet-Colonel R. N. Chopra and A. C. Roy -- Action on Smooth Muscles of Some Ephedrine-Like Amines / B. Mukerji -- Chemical and Pharmacological Examination of Randia Dumetorum, N. O. Rudiaceae / S. W. Hardikar and M. G. Mohiuddin -- Physical Changes in Blood in Vivo after Injection of Venom from Indian Cobra (Naia Naia Vel Tripudians) into Monkeys / Brevet-Colonel R. N. Chopra, S. N. Mukherjee and J. S. Chowhan -- Lead in Urine and Faeces / Rai Bahadur K. N. Bagchi and H. D. Ganguly -- Taenia Solium and Cysticercus Cellulosae in India / P. A. Maplestone and N. V. Bhaduri -- Investigations into the Epidemiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Part I. Introductory Notes and a Historical Survey / R. B. Lal and S. C. Roy -- Investigations into the Epidemiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Part II. A Summary of Field Studies / R. B. Lal and S. C. Roy -- Investigations into the Epidemiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Part III. Some Laboratory Studies on Rice as the Aetiological Agent / R. B. Lal, S. C. Roy and S. C. Ghosal -- Investigations into the Epidemiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Part IV. Experiments to Test the Validity of Infection Theory in a Semi-Isolated Community / R. B. Lal and S. C. Roy -- Investigations into the Epidemiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Part V. Feeding Experiments on Human Volunteers / R. B. Lal and S. C. Roy -- Studies on the Aetiology of Epidemic Dropsy. Effect of Plasma on Tissue Culture and Chorioallantoic Membranes of the Chick / Brevet-Colonel R. N. Chopra, N. N. Das and S. N. Mukherjee -- A Study of Ossification as Observed in Indian Subjects / G. Galstaun -- Backmatter / Colonel J. Taylor.

btitle: The Indian Journal of Medical Research, July 1937. Vol. 25, issue 1 (1937)
